name: Interactive Dashboard
description: Navigate your way into the heart of the DHIS2 data warehouse. With a simple but elegant web application you can manipulate any kind of data in DHIS2 and analyze specific kinds of data to your liking.

name: DHIS 2 Touch
description: District Health Information Software 2 Mobile Application that features full blown support for aggregate routine and survey data collection.
